Class Communicator

java.lang.Object
  Communicator

public class Communicator
extends java.lang.Object

Handles all sending and receiving of messages for SetPeer.

Author:
Ari

sendI_CLAIM_SET

public void sendI_CLAIM_SET(Card[] cards,
                            Player claimant)
Sends a message to all players alerting them that this peer has claimed a set.

Parameters:
cards - Array of cards in the set
claimant - Peer who is claiming the set

sendLOOKING_FOR_GAMES

Send a message to anyone who's listening in attempt to find games to join.

sendWHO_ARE_YOU

public void sendWHO_ARE_YOU(java.lang.String ip,
                            Player peteTownsend)
Sends a message asking for more info from a peer that just sent a "LOOKING_FOR_GAMES" message.

Parameters:
ip - IP address of the new player
peteTownsend - The player (or rock star) who is asking "Who are you? Who-who, who-who?"

sendI_AM_ME

public void sendI_AM_ME(Player peteTownsend,
                        Player me)
Sends a response to a "WHO_ARE_YOU" message, with attached information about the sending player.

Parameters:
peteTownsend - The player who was asking "Who are you? Who-who, who-who?"
me - Reference to the sending player

sendHERE_IS_A_GAME

public void sendHERE_IS_A_GAME(java.lang.String ip,
                               GameData gd)
Sends a message to a new player who has identified themselves via an "I_AM_ME" message, telling them about the game this peer is involved in. GameData is attached.

Parameters:
ip - IP address of the noob
gd - GameData of this game

sendNEW_PLAYER

public void sendNEW_PLAYER(Player p,
                           Player sender)
Sends a message which alerts all players that this player has just joined the game.

Parameters:
p - Newly joined player
sender - Player that introduced this new player to the game

sendQUIT

public void sendQUIT(Player p)
Sends a message alerting other players that we are quitting, so they know not to send us the token anymore.

Parameters:
p - Player that is quitting

sendWANT_MORE_CARDS

public void sendWANT_MORE_CARDS(int numPlayersWant)
Sends a message to other players that this player wants more cards dealt. Attached is the number of players that have already indicated that they want more cards.

Parameters:
numPlayersWant - Number of players that have already indicated that they want more cards

sendADDED_MORE_CARDS

public void sendADDED_MORE_CARDS(java.util.ArrayList<java.io.Serializable> data)
Send a message to all other players that more cards have been dealt.

Parameters:
data - The cards that were dealt
